item.title: Public International Law Notes
item.description: tag-notestag-tutorial Cheat Sheet Hierarchy of Sources and Jus Cogens . Montevideo Convention on the Rights and Duties of States Article 1 The state as a person of international law should possess the following qualifications: (a) a permanent population; (b) a defined territory; (c) government; and (d) capacity to enter into relations with the other states.
